title: CheerioBin
short: Developer Tool for comparing jQuery and cheerio
text:
Cheerio is a great server side module to run most of jQuery's core functions on the node.js server. comparing the cheerio and jquery results can be tedious. with CheerioBin you can now run Cheerio and jQuery commands simultaneously, and compare the results.

 

Technology

  • node.js
  • browserify
  • wzrd.in
  • cheerio
  • jQuery

 

www.cheeriobin.intesso.com

meta.title: cheeriobin
meta.description: cheeriobin | compare jQuery and cheerio results.
